name: Sex Simulator - College Girls
description:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a university professor who gets busy with his female students.

GAME DESCRIPTION

If you had a great time playing our "Sex Simulator" series, you'll definitely enjoy this one!
As the title says, "College Girls" is full of young, attractive women who are willing to do anything to get what they want.
Whether it's about asking for a higher grade or getting out of trouble, stand your ground and don't let them fool you with their hot bodies.
If you do let them play with your mind, put them in different positions and make them worth the risk of getting caught by the principal.
This video game features an arousing gameplay, high-resolution images and videos, realistic-looking characters, elegant environments, and steamy storylines.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
